name: Laws Of Chaos
description:
This is a game made for the 2020 Epic Mega Jam.
Made in 7 days, with One simple programmer and one graphic designed. Both inexperienced beyond hope, but we both hope you enjoy our concept of a game and our levels packaged inside.

Controls
WASD/SPACEBAR/ARROWKEYS 
Controller Left Thumbstick / Controller Face Bottom / Controller Right Thumbstick
Both control movement.

Note: some levels are broken as certain updates to the game changed how the player behaved. Also note that it's ONLY level design changed, I decided against fixing bugs/features so it's as close to the finished product submitted to the jam. Download the new & updated levels here: https://www.mediafire.com/file/npiz06dthal2auq/LawsOfChaos+Win64.zip/file

Also compiled a Linux version, but on the one tested Linux machine, we've found that materials supporting transparency turned blue. We have no idea why as none of us is familiar with materials or Linux: https://www.mediafire.com/file/yqyu447mai6v91e/LawsOfChaos+Linux.zip/file
